overview:
Sebastian Munz is co-founder and CTO of Yo.lk. He takes care of backend programming and server administration, but also plays the leading role in designing the interface of mite.

Sebastian was born in 1981 in Freiburg, Germany. After getting his 12-years-old hands on his first Macintosh, he quickly grew into hacking and designing. After finishing school, he started to work as a freelance developer in 2001. In 2002, he began to study Print & Media Technique at the University of Applied Sciences in Berlin, where he met Julia Soergel. After graduating as a “Diplom Ingenieur” in 2007, he went to Hamburg to work as a lead programmer, developing productivity web applications for internationally operating advertising agencies. In 2008, he co-founded Yo.lk. Sebastian is living and working in Hamburg.
